item.title: Nginx转发规则
item.description: Location | Syntax: | **location** [ = | ~ | ~* | ^~ ] *uri* { ... } **location** @*name* { ... } | | :——- | ———————————————————— | | Default: | — | | Context: | server, location | Sets configuration depending on a request URI. The matching is performed against a normalized URI, after decoding the text encoded in the “%XX” form, resolving references to relative path components “.
